The Senate just passed the Honoring our PACT Act, giving vets access to VA healthcare & benefits for exposure to toxic burn pits.

Trump was willing to tell any lie if it meant keeping power. He was willing to overthrow our democracy. 

Trump must be held accountable. #January6thHearings
